name: PrintHeader
author: ANTs Developers
description: A utility to print header information from an image file.

inputs.name: Image
inputs.description: The image file to extract header information from. Supported extension: .ext.

inputs.name: What Information
inputs.description: Specify the type of information to print: 0 for origin, 1 for spacing, 2 for size, 3 for index, 4 for direction.

output-files.name: Output
output-files.description: The printed header information from the specified image.
